name: .ESPROJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .ESPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Website project created by Espresso, a Mac program used for creating webpages and editing source code; saves a list of related files for the website project, as well as server publishing settings and other user preferences.

content: The directory containing the ESPROJ file is used as the root directory for the website.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
